languages.text: "Говори, {name}. Ты в шаге от высказываний, которые будут признаны покушением на мои привилегии, и я желаю, чтобы ты продолжал{mf||а}".
"Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."
languages.original_text: "Говори, {name}. Ты в шаге от высказываний, которые будут признаны покушением на мои привилегии, и я желаю, чтобы ты продолжал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."

traits.locale_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “你可以继续说下去，{name}。只差一步，你刚刚的发言就会被视为侵犯我的特权，所以我希望你能继续说下去。”
languages.original_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."

traits.locale_text: “你可以继续说下去，{name}。只差一步，你刚刚的发言就会被视为侵犯我的特权，所以我希望你能继续说下去。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「{name}、自分の意見を言え。私の特権を侵害するとみなされる発言をするまで、あと一歩だ。是非とも続けるがいい」
languages.original_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、自分の意見を言え。私の特権を侵害するとみなされる発言をするまで、あと一歩だ。是非とも続けるがいい」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Hable, {name}. Está a punto de hacer declaraciones que serán consideradas como una violación de mis privilegios, así que adelante».
languages.original_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."

traits.locale_text: «Hable, {name}. Está a punto de hacer declaraciones que serán consideradas como una violación de mis privilegios, así que adelante».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Sagt, was Ihr zu sagen habt, {name}. Ihr seid nur einen Schritt davon entfernt, Aussagen zu tätigen, die als Verletzung meiner Privilegien gelten würden. Ich lade Euch also herzlich ein, weiterzusprechen."
languages.original_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt, was Ihr zu sagen habt, {name}. Ihr seid nur einen Schritt davon entfernt, Aussagen zu tätigen, die als Verletzung meiner Privilegien gelten würden. Ich lade Euch also herzlich ein, weiterzusprechen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Dites ce que vous avez à dire, {name}. Vous êtes à un cheveu de faire des déclarations portant atteinte à mes privilèges, alors je vous en prie, poursuivez... »
languages.original_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."

traits.locale_text: « Dites ce que vous avez à dire, {name}. Vous êtes à un cheveu de faire des déclarations portant atteinte à mes privilèges, alors je vous en prie, poursuivez... »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Söyle söyleyeceğini {name}. İmtiyazlarımı hiçe saymak olarak değerlendirilebilecek söylemlerde bulunmanın yalnızca bir adım uzağındasın, konuşmaktan çekinme."
languages.original_text: "Speak your piece, {name}. You are but a step away from making statements that will be considered an infringement upon my privileges, so I invite you to continue."

traits.locale_text: "Söyle söyleyeceğini {name}. İmtiyazlarımı hiçe saymak olarak değerlendirilebilecek söylemlerde bulunmanın yalnızca bir adım uzağındasın, lütfen devam et o yüzden."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
